museum_name.value: Western Colorado Center for the Arts

notes.value: CSV: phone from IRS 990 database CSV: museum type 'ART MUSEUM' CSV: coordinates from IRS 990 database

summary_short: Explore the vibrant art scene at the Western Colorado Center for the Arts, a cultural gem in Grand Junction.
summary_long: The Western Colorado Center for the Arts, located in Grand Junction, serves as a vital cultural hub for the region. Known for its diverse art exhibitions and community engagement, the center offers a range of programs and events that cater to art enthusiasts of all ages. With a focus on both contemporary and traditional art forms, the center provides a platform for local and regional artists to showcase their work. Visitors can enjoy rotating exhibitions, participate in art classes, and attend special events that highlight the rich artistic heritage of Western Colorado. The center's commitment to education and community involvement makes it a must-visit destination for anyone interested in the arts.

collection_highlights.title: Paint the Town 2026: The Golden Age of Hollywood
collection_highlights.description: An annual fundraiser event showcasing themed art pieces.

collection_highlights.title: Center Stage Concert Series: Sinners & Saints
collection_highlights.description: A concert series featuring diverse musical performances.

collection_highlights.title: TLC for TAC Mini-Campaign
collection_highlights.description: A campaign to support and maintain the art center's facilities.

visitor_tips: Check the schedule for special events and exhibitions before visiting.
Consider becoming a member for free admission to hundreds of museums nationwide.
Visit during weekdays to avoid crowds and have a more intimate experience.
best_for: Art enthusiasts and families looking for cultural experiences.

tour_planning_scores.scoring_rationale: The Western Colorado Center for the Arts offers a moderate representation of contemporary and modern art, with a strong focus on community engagement and educational programs. The center's exhibitions are frequently updated, making it a dynamic cultural destination.
